languages.text: "Что касается пиратки Риззы, не скорби о ней. Да, порой в ее руки попадало что-то ценное, но скверного там было куда больше. Уверена, какая-нибудь мерзкая крыса из ее экипажа уже заняла ее место в "Амасекусе" и продолжает нечестивый торг... Пока я всех их не повесила".

"As for that pirate Ryzza, there is no need for you to mourn her. Yes, she did come across valuable prizes at times, but more often than not those prizes were tainted. Surely some other rat from her crew has already taken over her profane trade at the Amasecus and will be open for business... until I hang the lot of them, that is."
languages.original_text: "Что касается пиратки Риззы, не скорби о ней. Да, порой в ее руки попадало что-то ценное, но скверного там было куда больше. Уверена, какая-нибудь мерзкая крыса из ее экипажа уже заняла ее место в "Амасекусе" и продолжает нечестивый торг... Пока я всех их не повесила".

traits.locale_text: "As for that pirate Ryzza, there is no need for you to mourn her. Yes, she did come across valuable prizes at times, but more often than not those prizes were tainted. Surely some other rat from her crew has already taken over her profane trade at the Amasecus... until I hang them all."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

Surely some other rat from her crew has already taken over her profane trade at the Amasecus and will be open for business... until I hang the lot of them, that is."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “至于那个叫莱萨的海盗，你根本没必要为她哀悼。没错，她有的时候确实会提供有价值的战利品，但更多时候，那些东西已经遭到了腐化。她的那些手下之中，肯定已经有人接管了她在烈酒修会的亵渎生意……不过，总有一天，我会把这群为非作歹之辈统统送上绞架。”
languages.original_text: "As for that pirate Ryzza, there is no need for you to mourn her. Yes, she did come across valuable prizes at times, but more often than not those prizes were tainted. Surely some other rat from her crew has already taken over her profane trade at the Amasecus and will be open for business... until I hang the lot of them, that is."

traits.locale_text: “至于那个叫莱萨的海盗，你根本没必要为她哀悼。没错，她有的时候确实会提供有价值的战利品，但很多时候，那些东西已经遭到了腐化。她的那些手下里面，肯定已经有人接管了她在烈酒修会的亵渎生意……不过总有一天，我会把他们统统绞死。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「海賊リザの件で、お前が悲しむ必要はない。確かにあの女は貴重な獲物を見つけることもあったが、腐敗した獲物を見つける方が多かった。すでにあの女のクルー出身のネズミが、アマセックで汚れた商売を引き継いでビジネスを始めているだろう…私が逃れたネズミを処刑したらそれも終わり、だがね」
languages.original_text: "As for that pirate Ryzza, there is no need for you to mourn her. Yes, she did come across valuable prizes at times, but more often than not those prizes were tainted. Surely some other rat from her crew has already taken over her profane trade at the Amasecus and will be open for business... until I hang the lot of them, that is."

traits.locale_text: 「海賊リザの件で、お前が悲しむ必要はない。確かにあの女は貴重な獲物を見つけることもあったが、腐敗した獲物を見つける方が多かった。すでにあの女のクルー出身のネズミが、アマセックで汚れた商売を引き継いでビジネスを始めているだろう…私が逃れたネズミを処刑したらそれも終わり、だがね」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «En cuanto a la pirata Ryzza, no hay necesidad de que la llore. Es verdad que más de una vez dio con recompensas valiosas, pero la mayoría de veces estaban contaminadas. Seguro que alguna otra rata de su tripulación ya se ha hecho cargo de su oficio profano en el Amasecus y lo ha reabierto... No pararán hasta que los cuelgue a todos».
languages.original_text: "As for that pirate Ryzza, there is no need for you to mourn her. Yes, she did come across valuable prizes at times, but more often than not those prizes were tainted. Surely some other rat from her crew has already taken over her profane trade at the Amasecus and will be open for business... until I hang the lot of them, that is."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a la pirata Ryzza, no hay necesidad de que la llore. Es verdad que más de una vez dio con recompensas valiosas, pero la mayoría de veces estaban contaminadas. Seguro que alguna otra rata de su tripulación ya se ha hecho cargo de su oficio profano en el Amasecus... Hasta que no los cuelgue a todos».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Was diese Piratin Ryzza angeht, Ihr müsst sie nicht betrauern. Ja, sie hat wiederholt wertvolle Schätze aufgetan, doch meistens waren diese Schätze vergiftet. Gewiss hat schon eine andere Ratte aus ihrer Crew ihre ruchlosen Geschäfte im Amasecus übernommen und ist offen für Angebote ... bis ich sie alle hängen lasse."
languages.original_text: "As for that pirate Ryzza, there is no need for you to mourn her. Yes, she did come across valuable prizes at times, but more often than not those prizes were tainted. Surely some other rat from her crew has already taken over her profane trade at the Amasecus and will be open for business... until I hang the lot of them, that is."

traits.locale_text: "Was diese Piratin Ryzza angeht, Ihr müsst sie nicht betrauern. Ja, sie hat wiederholt wertvolle Schätze aufgetan, doch meistens waren diese Schätze vergiftet. Gewiss hat schon irgendeine andere Ratte aus ihrer Crew ihre schändlichen Geschäfte im Amasecus übernommen ... bis ich sie alle hänge."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Quant à Ryzza, inutile de la regretter. Certes, il lui arrivait parfois de tomber sur des articles de valeur, mais la plupart du temps, il s'agissait de matériel corrompu. J'imagine qu'un autre rat de son équipage a déjà repris son commerce impie à l'Amasecus... mais ils finiront tous pendus tôt ou tard. »
languages.original_text: "As for that pirate Ryzza, there is no need for you to mourn her. Yes, she did come across valuable prizes at times, but more often than not those prizes were tainted. Surely some other rat from her crew has already taken over her profane trade at the Amasecus and will be open for business... until I hang the lot of them, that is."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à Ryzza, inutile de la regretter. Certes, il lui arrivait parfois de tomber sur des articles de valeur, mais la plupart du temps, il s'agissait de matériel corrompu. J'imagine qu'un autre rat de son équipage a déjà repris son commerce impie à l'Amasecus... mais ils finiront tous pendus tôt ou tard. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Korsan Ryzza'ya gelirsek... Onun için yas tutmana gerek yok. Evet, bazen değerli ganimetlere denk gelirdi ancak genelde bu ganimetler kirli olurdu. Mürettebatından başka bir sıçanın, onun Amasekus'taki din dışı ticaretini devraldığına ve devam ettirdiğine eminim. Ancak hepsini asacağım."
languages.original_text: "As for that pirate Ryzza, there is no need for you to mourn her. Yes, she did come across valuable prizes at times, but more often than not those prizes were tainted. Surely some other rat from her crew has already taken over her profane trade at the Amasecus and will be open for business... until I hang the lot of them, that is."

traits.locale_text: "Korsan Ryzza'ya gelirsek, onun için yas tutmana gerek yok. Evet bazen değerli ganimetlere denk gelirdi ancak genelde bu ganimetler kirli olurdu. Mürettebatından başka bir sıçanın, onun Amasekus'taki din dışı ticaretini devraldığına ve devam ettirdiğine eminim. Ben geri kalanları da asana kadar tabii."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
